0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: All the big Everton news that real Toffees care about. Niall McCaughan rounds up the latest injuries, transfers and gossip from Goodison in this daily update. This is the voice of true Evertonians, brought to you by The Sport Social.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
